summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5491 for the improvement of 42nd Avenue West, from the north line of Carleton Park Addition to West Barrett Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70113, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
